name: Words within words that start with PRE Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
The question layout is as described below:

PRE + A clue for the 'word within the word' = A clue for the combined word. 

The answer is the combined word.

PRE + To have dispatched = A gift usually received at Christmas.
PRE + Multiple body pains = Speaks religious texts.
PRE + Noted down dictated text = Given medicine by a doctor.
PRE + To walk slowly = A preliminary statement.
PRE + To work for (as a slave) = To maintain a good standard.
PRE + Your opinion = An early showing (of a film).
PRE + The front surface of the head = An introductory section of a speech.
PRE + The centre of a volcano = To stop from happening.
PRE + Easily bruised = Someone who is false.
